unnormalised: New Delhi: The Ministry of Defence announced the promotion of several officers across various ranks on 10/11/2024. Among those elevated was Col. R.K. Sharma, who has been promoted to the rank of Brigadier. The announcement comes as part of a routine restructuring exercise within the armed forces.
normalised: New Delhi: The Ministry of Defence announced the promotion of several officers across various ranks on tenth november two thousand and twenty four. Among those elevated was Colonel R. K. Sharma, who has been promoted to the rank of Brigadier. The announcement comes as part of a routine restructuring exercise within the armed forces.

unnormalised: Furthermore, Lt. Gen. Menon has been appointed as the new Director General of Military Operations (DGMO), effective 01/12/2024. He succeeds Lt. Gen. Kumar, who is set to retire. The transition will be marked by a formal ceremony at Army HQ next month.
normalised: Furthermore, Lieutenant General Menon has been appointed as the new Director General of Military Operations (D-G-M-O), effective first december two thousand and twenty four. He succeeds Lieutenant General Kumar, who is set to retire. The transition will be marked by a formal ceremony at Army H-Q next month.

unnormalised: In related news, Maj. S. Banerjee received the Sena Medal for gallantry displayed during a counter-insurgency operation in J&K. The award ceremony, presided over by Gen. Chauhan, Chief of Defence Staff, took place at the South Block earlier today at 11:00 AM.
normalised: In related news, Major S. Banerjee received the Sena Medal for gallantry displayed during a counter-insurgency operation in J and K. The award ceremony, presided over by General Chauhan, Chief of Defence Staff, took place at the South Block earlier today at eleven AM.
